text: OK - someone correct me if this has been done before, but is there a package already that scans for which functions in your package have docstrings, allows you to choose different templates, can pretty print a list of missing docstrings?

elements.text: OK - someone correct me if this has been done before, but is there a package already that scans for which functions in your package have docstrings, allows you to choose different templates, can pretty print a list of missing docstrings?

text: Perhaps something in Documenter.DocChecks can be adapted to do this?
